General.Name: Probe Metals Inc
General.Description: Probe Gold Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of gold properties in Canada. The company's flagship asset is its 100%-owned Novador property located in the city of Val-d'Or, Quebec. The company was formerly known as Probe Metals Inc. and changed its name to Probe Gold Inc. in January 2023. Probe Gold Inc. was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 56 Temperance Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 3V5
